name: Donald Trump vs Zombies
description:
It's time to Make America great again by freeing it from the hordes of Zombies!

Play as The Donald, attack Zombies through a variety of challenging levels using powerful weapons and vehicles as you race from Washington through the Suburbs as you blast your way to the wall to defend it.

Zombies have made it inland and your Homeland Security has gone AWOL and only you can stop them. Trump vs Zombies brings hilarious Trump quotes to boot!

Unlock the exciting new Arcade Mode as you run and gun in endless style blasting Zombies on the ground and in the air!

"I've built a wall. I have to defend that wall' - Donald Trump 2017

Weapons are 90% off using freely available in game currency - there's no In App Purchases.

Features
• A Donald Trump game like no other
• Trump vs Zombies features a variety of game play modes
• Unlock secret bonus levels
• Unlock new more powerful weapons
• No In App Purchases
• Action packed fun with original Trump quotes
• Platform, Shooter, Endless runner game modes
• NEW Arcade Mode

Thanks for playing! Be sure to rate us after each update.

DISCLAIMER: For humour/satirical purposes only. Not to be taken seriously. Reference to any celebrity or other person does not constitute or imply sponsorship, endorsement, or recommendation.
